text: Brickellia paucidentata is a South American species of flowering plants in the daisy family. It is native to Santa Cruz Department in eastern Bolivia.Klatt, Friedrich Wilhelm 1881. Abhandlungen der Naturforschenden Gesellschaft zu Halle 15(2): 326Tropicos, Brickellia paucidentata Klatt ==References== coulteri Category:Flora of Bolivia Category:Plants described in 1881
title: Brickellia paucidentata
